original_text: And Jotham slept with his fathers, and they buried him in the city of David, and Ahaz his son reigned in his place.
korean_text: 그가 그의 조상들과 함께 누우매 다윗 성에 장사되고 그의 아들 아하스가 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Jotham slept with his fathers
they buried him in the city of David
Ahaz his son reigned in his place
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 아하스가 그를 대신하여 왕이 되었다
